en.acceptedStatusMsg: Your decree nisi application has been accepted
en.acceptedStatusDetails: A district judge will formally announce the decree nisi at a court hearing. This is the first stage of the decree ending your marriage.
en.acceptedStatusPanelDetails: You’ll only be divorced when the second stage is complete and you have your decree absolute.
en.acceptedHearingMsg1: You can find more details about the date of the hearing and the orders that will be made (including costs orders) in your Certificate Of Entitlement ({{ certificateOfEntitlementFile.fileType | upper }}).
en.acceptedHearingInfo: You don’t need to come to the hearing unless you want to object to any of the court orders being made.
en.acceptedHearingMsg2: If you want to attend the hearing, you need to email the court before the hearing date.
en.acceptedHearingMsg2Costs: If you, or your {{ divorceWho }}, want to dispute a costs order, the court must receive a letter or email stating the reasons for doing so at least 14 days before the hearing date.

cy.acceptedStatusMsg: Mae eich cais am Ddyfarniad Nisi wedi’i dderbyn
cy.acceptedStatusDetails: Bydd Barnwr Rhanbarth yn cyhoeddi’r Dyfarniad Nisi yn ffurfiol mewn gwrandawiad llys. Dyma gam cyntaf y dyfarniad a fydd yn dod â’ch priodas i ben.
cy.acceptedStatusPanelDetails: Dim ond pan fydd yr ail gam wedi’i gwblhau ac y byddwch wedi cael eich Dyfarniad Absoliwt y byddwch wedi ysgaru.
cy.acceptedHearingMsg1: Gallwch gael mwy o wybodaeth am ddyddiad y gwrandawiad a’r gorchmynion a wneir (gan gynnwys gorchmynion costau) yn eich Tystysgrif Hawl ({{ certificateOfEntitlementFile.fileType | upper }}).
cy.acceptedHearingInfo: Nid oes angen ichi ddod i'r gwrandawiad oni bai eich bod am wrthwynebu unrhyw rai o'r gorchmynion llys sy'n cael eu gwneud.
cy.acceptedHearingMsg2: Os ydych eisiau mynychu’r gwrandawiad, bydd angen ichi anfon neges e-bost i'r llys cyn dyddiad y gwrandawiad.
cy.acceptedHearingMsg2Costs: Os ydych chi, neu’ch {{ divorceWho }} eisiau gwrthwynebu gorchymyn costau, rhaid i'r llys gael llythyr neu neges e-bost yn nodi'r rhesymau dros wneud hynny o leiaf 14 diwrnod cyn dyddiad y gwrandawiad.
